name: Castle Torgeath Redux
description:
Strap yourself in for an epic dungeon adventure! Trapped inside a legendary castle, slay anything that moves with your trusty sword and spells, all while looting everything in sight. Uncover the castle’s dark secrets and barter with its hapless denizens. With full 3d motion and a fistful of potions, what could go wrong!

In Castle Torgeath Redux, you play an errant battle mage who is left behind by your party of explorers. Wanting to make your riches anyway you march on in only to get trapped and needing to find a way to escape. Not one to fear easily or failing to see the irony in any situation, you steal yourself for the journey ahead ready to face any problem with excessive violence and great skill.

Castle Torgeath Redux features:

  • Discover a deep story spanning years of conflict and magic
  • Roam the vast dungeons of Castle Torgeath with full 3D motion
  • Battle over twenty enemy types through your journey
  • Find over six weapons to defeat your enemies
  • Collect physics-based loot to chug at enemies with our new Loot Thrower
  • Level yourself up with a streamlined RPG system
  • Enjoy full NPC and player voice overs for a more immersive experience
  • Challenge yourself with a diehard permadeath rogue mode
  • Hunt down the morphic creatures before they hunt you

Castle Torgeath: Redux was influenced by games such as Oblivion, Hades, Hexen, and King’s Field but adds new comedic twists to these classic styles. Combining a unique flare of action, story, and role play features plus a dash of satire, Castle Torgeath: Redux is the 3D dungeon adventure revamped and we hope you will come along for the ride!
